reviews.review_msg: Pretty decent course. 5 online discussions worth 5% each. A 2,500 - 3,000 word term paper worth 20% on a topic of your choice. Mid-term was quite fair, two essay questions for 25%. However, the final was a curve ball. Nothing like what was expected. Consisted of 10 short essays and 1 long essay for 30% and was cumulative

Ugh, took this course in Fall 2012 and it was HARD and TIME CONSUMING. I was really interested in the topic going in and walked out regretting it. I wanted an elective related to law and regret not taking CRIM 135 instead. Overall, extremely hard for an EDUC course and requires a LOT of time and effort for little reward
Literally the sweetest human on earth. Dont know how anyone could dislike the guy

Marc was my TA for EDUC445 and he is genuinely caring & kind. He really really wants the best for us students and that is a rare quality to come across from a TA. I am forever grateful for him and will always remember how helpful and concerned he was when I needed advice and assistance for my individual paper. Thank you Marc if you ever read this!
